comments.author: yawars20
comments.body: After familiarizing myself with The White Paper, I became aware of the various PARADIGMS and metaversions. It has come to my attention that a prize pool of 1 million will be allocated among each metaversion based on their level of participation and contribution. While this distribution makes sense,  But I am curious about the benefits associated with owning NFTs within one's wallet or account.

comments.author: YASHA OTTO
comments.body: Quote from: yawars20 on December 06, 2023, 03:23:04 PMAfter familiarizing myself with The White Paper, I became aware of the various PARADIGMS and metaversions. It has come to my attention that a prize pool of 1 million will be allocated among each metaversion based on their level of participation and contribution. While this distribution makes sense,  But I am curious about the benefits associated with owning NFTs within one's wallet or account.Thank you for your interest in our project! NFT Tokens for the draw of nine paradigms are essentially a ticket to the first mission! These NFT cards depicting one of the nine paradigms are valid once, after which they remain in the participant's collection. The drawing will take place every nine days - forty times a year! This is an ongoing tour and each time new NFT tickets will be used that are played only once! Each of the Paradigms has its own missions and NFTs - each of which has staking functionality from 0.1 -10% per day of profit in the PARAD token, depending on the features of the NFT.

comments.author: YASHA OTTO

IT IS IMPOSSIBLE NOT TO NOTICE IT!  SO 50% OF ALL USERS OF THE PLATFORM WILL NOT BE ORDINARY TRADERS AND TOKEN HOLDERS, BUT PEOPLE INTERESTED IN CONSPEROLOGI AND ALL ITS AREAS, WE WILL ACTUALLY BRING TO THE MARKET THOUSANDS OF NEW PEOPLE WHO WILL PARTICIPATE IN THE CRYPTO-PROJECT, BECAUSE OTHERWISE IT IS IMPOSSIBLE TO BECOME PARTICIPANTS OF DISPUTES AND DISCUSSIONS ON OUR PLATFORM - EVERY DAY SEVERAL HUNDRED TIMES! HAVING CONDUCTED STATISTICS, WE HAVE MADE SURE THAT THERE ARE TEN TIMES MORE PEOPLE IN THE FIELD OF CONSPEROLOGY THAN ALL THOSE WHO EARN ON BLOCKCHAIN AND CRYPTOCURRENCY !!!!. OUR PROJECT IS TO COMBINE THESE TWO SPHERES WITH MAXIMUM BENEFIT FOR EVERYONE !  HOW THIS PROCESS WILL TAKE PLACE, EVERYONE WILL LEARN AT THE OPENING OF THE FIRST NFT FORUM IN THE PARADIGMA NFT META-UNIVERSE ITSELF.

comments.author: YASHA OTTO
comments.body: The opening of the platform will take place in several stages. The first stage will be the opening of the NFT FORUM PARADIGMA! This is the world's first NFT platform, which has an intellectual character + NFT TOTALIZER and a large number of all kinds of directions with the discussion of various events and answers to many questions in the form of disputes with the help of NFT . This platform will host regular debates on various topics for the prize money of PARAD token.This discovery phase is planned for the near future and will open in the spring of 2024. We will soon start giving away NFT tokens on our OpenSea account, these will be NFT tokens for the first round of voting to choose one of the nine paradigms. Everything we have planned, we will implement on time! Yesterday there was a listing on one of the DEXs, PancakeSwap, and today there will be a second listing on UniSwap. These two exchanges were chosen by us as the instrument for the initial sale of the token - the price today is 0.0001 Usdt.

comments.author: YASHA OTTO
comments.body: The team is working on the functionality and in the near future will be an announcement about the opening of several functionalities, section NFT FORUM TOTALIZER in which will be held more than a thousand disputes a day on all sorts of topics - for the prize fund in tokens PARAD, the second functionality that will be opened in the near future is ,,Monarch - Dictator" in this section in the form of nft will be presented a large number of global secret organizations in which you can join and even head, lead them in the virtual world with the help of purchased NFT statuses !  At the same time, everyone who bought a status in this or that organization will have a lifetime income from this status on the POS system ! Also we will provide you with a unique functionality NFT STABLE token. This unique development of our team will allow you all to keep tokens of many projects in the form of one token NFT STABLE. And get profit on POS system regardless of the rate of your chosen NFT STABLE token, your chosen NFT STABLE token will always have the price for which you bought it, plus you will get interest for owning it!                                                          You will only be able to exchange this NFT token on our PARADIGMA NFT METAVERSE platform for a PARAD token .
